Statute.Title: Fighting Against Forced Labour and Child Labour in Supply Chains Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Loi sur la lutte contre le travail forcé et le travail des enfants dans les chaines d’approvisionnement)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2023, c. 9 (assent: 11.05.2023), in force on January 1 of the year following the year in which it receives royal assent see s. 28
